conversations.conversation: k...wel by now the news tht hi5 is blocked..n ive always been skeptical of other such sites ; s like it ; (zorpia,multiply,etc)...but now tht i check out face box n compare it to my memory of hi5..i think we didnt lose tht much...this place seems a hell-of-a-lot more organized n interesting...just a thought...much luv ppl
